Title: Kaminey
Writer: Cajetan Boy (based on an idea by), Supratik Sen (screenplay), Abhishek Chaubey (screenplay), Sabrina Dhawan (screenplay), Vishal Bhardwaj (screenplay), Vishal Bhardwaj (dialogue)
Actors: Shahid Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra, Deb Mukherjee, Shivkumar Subramaniam
Plot: The desperate lives of two estranged twin brothers converge over missing drugs, politics, racial prejudice, corrupt cops and an unplanned pregnancy.
